Header.Notes: Regridded on the grid of RDRS v2.1, then bias-adjusted with detrended quantile mapping on a day-of-year basis with a window of 31 days, LOESS detrending and 50 quantiles. The reference was RDRS v2.1 over the 1989-2018 period. The variables tasmax, dtr and pr were adjusted, tasmin was computed from tasmax and dtr after the adjustment.
